snippet.title: War Hospital | Letter to Elisabeth
snippet.description:
Developed by Polish studio Brave Lamb, War Hospital is a story-driven management and survival game in which you need to make difficult moral choices. During NACON Connect, War Hospital showed new gameplay footage in a trailer that featured the story of an injured soldier.

In War Hospital, you take charge of a field hospital during the Great War and must treat the injured that arrive while managing the hospital's staff and resources.

#WarHospital is coming to PC, PlayStation 5 & Xbox Series X|S on August 31, 2023.
-------------------------------
